dcterms:description: An experimental dataset from a pragmatic clinical trial used to illustrate the application of structural causal models (SCM) and do-calculus for causal effect estimation.
dcterms:title: Experimental dataset from a pragmatic clinical trial

dcterms:creator: C. Eric McCoy
dcterms:description: A hypothetical pragmatic clinical trial dataset used to evaluate the effectiveness of adding surgery to conventional medical therapy in patients with cardiovascular disease.
dcterms:title: Hypothetical pragmatic clinical trial dataset

dcterms:description: An existing real-world data EHR dataset mentioned in the context of observational studies.
dcterms:title: EHR dataset

dcterms:creator: V. M. Montori
G. H. Guyatt
dcterms:description: Data from other similar studies for pragmatic clinical trials, used to support the analysis and findings related to intention-to-treat principles.
dcterms:title: Data from other similar studies for PCT

dcterms:creator: B. C. Johnston
G. H. Guyatt
dcterms:description: Data from other similar studies for pragmatic clinical trials, used to support the analysis and findings related to treatment adherence and missing participant outcome data.
dcterms:title: Data from other similar studies for PCT
